data.name: textBox2.Text
data.value:
from tkinter import *
root = Tk() root.title("Переменные и константы") root.geometry("550x400")
def clicked(): str221 = str(20 * int(entry22.get())) label221.configure(text = str221) str231 = str(30 * int(entry23.get())) label231.configure(text = str231) str241 = str(10 * int(entry24.get())) label241.configure(text = str241) str251 = str(int(str221) + int(str231) + int(str241)) label251.configure(text = str251)
def clear(): label221.configure(text="0") entry22.delete(0, END) label231.configure(text="0") entry23.delete(0, END) label241.configure(text="0") entry24.delete(0, END) label251.configure(text="0")
label11 = Label(text = "Меню", bg = "#eee", fg = "red", font = 'arial 16') label11.place(x = 100, y = 25)
label12 = Label(text = "Борщ", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label12.place(x = 50, y = 70) label121 = Label(text = "20", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label121.place(x = 170, y = 70) label122 = Label(text = "р.", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label122.place(x = 200, y = 70)
label13 = Label(text = "Тефтели с \nвермишелью", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label13.place(x = 50, y = 120) label131 = Label(text = "30", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label131.place(x = 170, y = 120) label132 = Label(text = "р.", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label132.place(x = 200, y = 120)
label14 = Label(text = "Компот", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label14.place(x = 50, y = 180) label141 = Label(text = "10", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label141.place(x = 170, y = 180) label142 = Label(text = "р.", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label142.place(x = 200, y = 180)
label15 = Label(text = "Приятного \nаппетита!", bg = "#eee", fg = "red", font = 'arial 20') label15.place(x = 50, y = 250)
label21 = Label(text = "Заказ", bg = "#eee", fg = "red", font = 'arial 16') label21.place(x = 400, y = 25)
entry22 = Entry(root, width = 12) entry22.place(x=300, y=70) label221 = Label(text = "0", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label221.place(x=420, y=70) label222 = Label(text = "р.", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label222.place(x=500, y=70)
entry23 = Entry(root, width = 12) entry23.place(x=300, y=120) label231 = Label(text = "0", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label231.place(x=420, y=120) label232 = Label(text = "р.", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label232.place(x=500, y=120)
entry24 = Entry(root, width = 12) entry24.place(x=300, y=180) label241 = Label(text = "0", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label241.place(x=420, y=180) label242 = Label(text = "р.", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label242.place(x=500, y=180)
label25 = Label(text = "Сумма:", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label25.place(x=300, y=250) label251 = Label(text = "0", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label251.place(x=420, y=250) label252 = Label(text = "р.", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = 'arial 12') label252.place(x=500, y=250)
but1 = Button(root, text = "Заказать", command = clicked) but1.place(x = 300, y = 300)
but2 = Button(root, text = "Очистить", command = clear) but2.place(x = 450, y = 300)
but3 = Button(root, text = "Закрыть", command = exit) but3.place(x = 450, y = 350)
root.mainloop()

data.name: textBox1.Text
data.value:
import math from tkinter import *
root = Tk() root.title("Число") root.geometry("550x350")
def clicked(): str2 = str(float(entry1.get())**2) label21.configure(text = str2) str3 = str(float(entry1.get())**3) label31.configure(text = str3) str4 = str(math.sqrt(float(entry1.get()))) label41.configure(text = str4)
def clear(): entry1.delete(0, END) label21.configure(text = "") label31.configure(text = "") label41.configure(text = "")
label1 = Label(text = "Введите число", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label1.place(x = 50, y = 25) entry1 = Entry(root, width = 20) entry1.place(x = 200, y = 25)
label2 = Label(text = "Квадрат =", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label2.place(x = 50, y = 100) label21 = Label(text = "", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label21.place(x = 150, y = 100)
label3 = Label(text = "Куб =", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label3.place(x = 50, y = 150) label31 = Label(text = "", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label31.place(x = 100, y = 150)
label4 = Label(text = "Корень квадратный =", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label4.place(x = 50, y = 200) label41 = Label(text = "", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label41.place(x = 225, y = 200)
but1 = Button(root, text = "Вычислить", command = clicked) but1.place(x = 50, y = 275)
but2 = Button(root, text = "Очистить", command = clear) but2.place(x = 200, y = 275)
but3 = Button(root, text = "Закрыть", command = exit) but3.place(x = 350, y = 275)
label5 = Label(text = "Дробные числа вводятся \nчерез точку !!!", bg = "#eee", fg = "yellow", font = "arial 10") label5.place(x = 375, y = 25)
root.mainloop()

data.name: textBox3.Text
data.value:
from tkinter import * import math
root = Tk() root.title("Решение квадратного уравнения") root.geometry("600x350")
def clicked(): if float(entry2.get()) == 0 and float(entry3.get()) == 0: d = 'noun' label5.configure(text = "") label51.configure(text = "Ошибка!") label6.configure(text="") label61.configure(text="") label7.configure(text="") label71.configure(text="") else: d = str(float(entry3.get()) ** 2 - 4 * float(entry2.get()) * float(entry4.get())) label5.configure(text="D =") label51.configure(text=d) if float(entry2.get()) == 0: x = str(-1 * float(entry4.get()) / float(entry3.get())) label6.configure(text="X =") label61.configure(text=x) label7.configure(text="") label71.configure(text="") elif float(d) < 0 and float(entry2.get()) != 0: label6.configure(text="Уравнение не имеет корней") label61.configure(text="") label7.configure(text="") label71.configure(text="") elif float(d) == 0 and float(entry2.get()) != 0: x = str(-1 * float(entry3.get()) / (2 * float(entry2.get()))) label6.configure(text="X =") label61.configure(text=x) label7.configure(text="") label71.configure(text="") elif float(d) > 0 and float(entry2.get()) != 0: x1 = str(-1 * float(entry3.get()) + math.sqrt(float(d)) / (2 * float(entry2.get()))) label6.configure(text="X1 =") label61.configure(text=x1) x2 = str(-1 * float(entry3.get()) - math.sqrt(float(d)) / (2 * float(entry2.get()))) label7.configure(text="X2 =") label71.configure(text=x2)
label1 = Label(text = "Введите коэффициенты квадратного уравнения", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 16") label1.place(x = 75, y = 25)
label2 = Label(text = "A =", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label2.place(x = 75, y = 75) entry2 = Entry(root, width = 12) entry2.place(x = 125, y = 75)
label3 = Label(text = "B =", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label3.place(x = 250, y = 75) entry3 = Entry(root, width = 12) entry3.place(x = 300, y = 75)
label4 = Label(text = "C =", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label4.place(x = 425, y = 75) entry4 = Entry(root, width = 12) entry4.place(x = 475, y = 75)
label5 = Label(text="", bg="#eee", fg="black", font="arial 12") label5.place(x=75, y=175) label51 = Label(text="", bg="#eee", fg="black", font="arial 12") label51.place(x=125, y=175)
label6 = Label(text = "", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label6.place(x = 75, y = 225) label61 = Label(text = "", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label61.place(x = 125, y = 225)
label7 = Label(text = "", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label7.place(x = 75, y = 275) label71 = Label(text = "", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 12") label71.place(x = 125, y = 275)
but1 = Button(root, text = "Найти корни уравнения", command = clicked) but1.place(x = 250, y = 125)
but2 = Button(root, text = "Закрыть", command = exit) but2.place(x = 500, y = 300)
root.mainloop()

data.name: textBox4.Text
data.value:
from tkinter import *
root = Tk() root.title("Умники и умницы") root.geometry("600x350")
def clicked(): if int(spin1.get()) == 0: label6.configure(text="Поучи-ка ещё!") elif int(spin1.get()) == 1: label6.configure(text = "Умница!") elif int(spin1.get()) == 2: label6.configure(text = "Поучи-ка ещё!") elif int(spin1.get()) == 3: label6.configure(text="Поучи-ка ещё!") elif int(spin1.get()) == 4: label6.configure(text="Поучи-ка ещё!")
def clear(): spin1.delete(0, END) label6.configure(text = "")
label = Label(text = "Сколько бит в 10 килобайтах?", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = "arial 14") label.place(x = 175, y = 25)
label1 = Label(text = "1", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 14") label1.place(x = 75, y = 75) label11 = Label(text = "81920", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = "arial 14") label11.place(x = 125, y = 75)
label2 = Label(text = "2", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 14") label2.place(x = 75, y = 125) label21 = Label(text = "10240", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = "arial 14") label21.place(x = 125, y = 125)
label3 = Label(text = "3", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 14") label3.place(x = 350, y = 75) label31 = Label(text = "80", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = "arial 14") label31.place(x = 400, y = 75)
label4 = Label(text = "4", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 14") label4.place(x = 350, y = 125) label41 = Label(text = "10485760", bg = "#eee", fg = "blue", font = "arial 14") label41.place(x = 400, y = 125)
label5 = Label(text = "Введи номер ответа", bg = "#eee", fg = "black", font = "arial 14") label5.place(x = 75, y = 200)
spin1 = Spinbox(root, from_=0, to = 4, width=5) spin1.place(x = 275, y = 205)
label6 = Label(text = "", bg = "#eee", fg = "red", font = "arial 16") label6.place(x = 200, y = 250)
but1 = Button(root, text = "Проверь себя!", command=clicked) but1.place(x = 450, y = 200)
but2 = Button(root, text = "Очистить", command=clear) but2.place(x = 450, y = 250)
but3 = Button(root, text = "Закрыть", command=exit) but3.place(x = 450, y = 300) root.mainloop()
